name: Killer Girlfriends
description:
Contest entry for KillerGF's project.

Game & Art: by Shinjurou

Game Engine: RPG Maker MZ

Music:

  • run (joo_yy)
  • Jazzy Abstract Beat (Coma-Media)
  • Dreamy Jazz - Slow Background Jazz Music - Grand Piano and Seattle Strings (Julius_H)
  • Claude Debussy - Reverie - Classical Remix (Nesrality)
  • Edvard Grieg - Album Leaf - Classical Remix (Nesrality)
  • NightLife - Michael Kobrin - 95bpm (MichaelKobrin)
  • Quando - Acoustic Guitar Bossa Nova (Julius H)
